title: The Writer's Almanac - Wednesday, October 30, 2019
description: Today we feature a poem by Marjorie Saiser, “Word Gets Out About the Divorce,” and celebrate the birthday of President John Adams.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today we feature a poem by Marjorie Saiser, “Word Gets Out About the Divorce,” and celebrate the birthday of President John Adams.
